entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING

entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
